About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

Hi, I'm Mohd Abdullah, a second-year B.Sc. (Hons) Electronics student at Acharya Narendra Dev College, University of Delhi, with a strong passion for Web Development, Artificial Intelligence, and building impactful tech solutions.
I've worked on projects combining Django, Python, and Deep Learning, including a fully functional Lab Management System and a SPIE School Club Registration Portal. I'm also an active member of the SPIE Student Chapter at ANDC, where I contribute to both technical development and community outreach.
Currently exploring opportunities in full-stack development, backend engineering, and AI/ML applications â€” always learning, building, and growing.
Let's connect and create something meaningful!

Tech Community

SPIE Chapter Member

  • Active contributor to the SPIE Student Chapter at ANDC DU, where I build tech solutions and help organize events.

Web Development

Full-Stack Developer

  • I focus on building clean, intuitive, and performance-optimized web apps.

AI & Deep Learning

Deep Learning Enthusiast

  • Explored neural networks and implemented a Deep Learning model as part of my Lab Management System project.
  • Currently learning about image processing, classification models, and practical AI tools using Python.
